title: Customer Data Ingestion Notifications Event
description: Customer notification events for data ingestion processes.

xdm:eventType.title: Event Type
xdm:eventType.description: Event type of customer data ingestion notification.

xdm:status.title: Ingestion Status
xdm:status.description: The current status of this ingestion process.

xdm:ingestionId.title: Ingestion ID
xdm:ingestionId.description: System generates Unique Identifier for a data ingestion instance.

xdm:parentIngestionId.title: Parent Ingestion ID
xdm:parentIngestionId.description: In a flow where multiple insgestion stage, each stage employs its own ingestion identifier, this value represents the parent stage that resulted in the initiation of this ingestion. This can be used to correlate ingestion processes over multiple stages.

xdm:customerIngestionId.title: Customer Batch Identifier
xdm:customerIngestionId.description: Customers can specify an externally generated identifier for this ingestion.

xdm:sandboxName.title: Sandbox Name
xdm:sandboxName.description: Name of the sandbox where data is ingested.

xdm:inputFormat.title: Input File Format
xdm:inputFormat.description: Metadata describing the INGEST format of the data being loaded (e.g. Parquet, CSV, JSON).

xdm:startTime.description: The unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the batch processing action was started.

xdm:completionTime.description: The unix timestamp (in milliseconds) when the batch processing action was completed. Completed - Started should yield the total processing time.

xdm:failedRecords.description: Number of records failed to ingest.

xdm:errors.description: A list of problems encountered during this ingestion process.

xdm:code.description: An enumerated code that details the type of error encountered. This value should be understandable by the reader and writer and eventually allow for localized error message (and solution) descriptions.

xdm:rows.description: Indicates which rows exhibit this error. Could be a single number, or a hyphen-delimited range.

items.description: Row or range of rows this error was encountered on.

xdm:description.description: A human-readable description of the error. This message may be transmitted to clients, but isn't meant for customer-facing UIS.
